state_analysis: The commands to terminate any existing Stockfish processes and check the status of Stockfish are not executing successfully, indicating that the terminal may be unresponsive or that the commands are timing out.
explanation: To resolve this, we will restart the Stockfish engine by reinstalling it and then attempt to analyze the chess position again. This approach will ensure that the engine is cleanly set up and ready for analysis.

commands.keystrokes: python3 -c 'import chess.engine; board = chess.Board(); engine = chess.engine.SimpleEngine.popen_uci("/usr/games/stockfish"); result = engine.play(board, chess.engine.Limit(time=2.0)); print(result.move)' > /app/move.txt
